notes: Normal (up to 10 business days) or urgent (up to 6 business days).
Organization name, position, address, phone number.
Color on white background, 3×4 or 3.5×4.5, taken within last 3 months.
Position and salary; on letterhead; sealed/signed.
Invitation; if none, hotel + air tickets booking.
